sources.title: Meet Simon Cherry
sources.description: Title: Meet Simon Cherry Summary: When the reclusive invalid daughter of Lady Harling is found dead, a young lady is suspected of murdering her. Directed by: Godfrey Grayson Actors: Hugh Moxey, Jeannette Tregarthen, Anthony Forwood Production Company: Hammer Films Release Date: November 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When the reclusive invalid daughter of Lady Harling is found dead, a young lady is suspected of murdering her.

metadata.Plot: When the reclusive invalid daughter of Lady Harling is found dead, a young lady is suspected of murdering her.
metadata.Writer: Godfrey Grayson, Gale Pedrick, A.R. Rawlinson
metadata.Actors: Hugh Moxey, Jeannette Tregarthen, Anthony Forwood
